source:
spark.sql(f"""CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE crm_sanctioneddb.dim_geography
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://{fabric_workspace}@onelake.dfs.fabric.microsoft.com/crm_sanctioneddb.Lakehouse/Tables/dim_geography'
AS
SELECT
    COALESCE(source.Geography_id_nk, '0') AS Geography_id_nk,
    COALESCE(source.Geography_desc_nk, 'MISSING') AS Geography_desc_nk,
    COALESCE(source.Chemonics_Location, 'MISSING') AS Chemonics_Location,
    COALESCE(source.Audit_Hash_Cd, hash('MISSING')) AS Audit_Hash_Cd,
    COALESCE(source.IsActive, 1) AS IsActive,
    COALESCE(source.effective_start_date, CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE)) AS effective_start_date,
    COALESCE(source.effective_end_date, CAST('9999-12-31' AS DATE)) AS effective_end_date,
    current_date() AS Date_Created,
    current_date() AS Date_Updated_Last,
    current_user() AS Created_By,
    current_user() AS Updated_By
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        G.new_counrtyid AS Geography_id_nk,
        '' AS Geography_desc_nk,  -- Assuming a placeholder for description as empty
        G.new_name AS Chemonics_Location,
        HASH(G.new_counrtyid, G.new_name) AS Audit_Hash_Cd,
        G.IsActive,
        CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE) AS effective_start_date,
        CAST('9999-12-31' AS DATE) AS effective_end_date,
        current_date() AS Date_Created,
        current_date() AS Date_Updated_Last,
        current_user() AS Created_By,
        current_user() AS Updated_By
    FROM crm_query.new_counrty G
    WHERE G.new_counrtyid IS NOT NULL
    UNION ALL
    SELECT '-1', 'INVALID', 'INVALID', hash('INVALID'), 1,  
    CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE), 
    CAST('9999-12-31' AS DATE),
    current_date(), current_date(),
    current_user(), current_user()
    UNION ALL
    SELECT '0', 'MISSING', 'MISSING', hash('MISSING'), 1, 
    CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE), 
    CAST('9999-12-31' AS DATE),
    current_date(), current_date(),
    current_user(), current_user()
) AS source;
""")
